coap.title: COAP
coap.text: COAP is a drag-and-drop visual tool for creating educational content, similar to Canva or Wix, but specifically focused on teaching materials. With an intuitive interface, it allows educators, instructional designers, and content creators to quickly assemble interactive materials without the need for technical knowledge.

customDeploy.title: Custom Deploy
customDeploy.text: CustomDeploy is a complete solution for automating the deployment of web applications and APIs hosted on IIS, integrating a robust backend in .NET 8 and a modern frontend in React + TypeScript. The system allows managing publications, authentication, and centralized permissions.

netcoreStarter.title: NetCore Api StarterPack
netcoreStarter.text:
API in ASP.NET Core 8.0 designed as a starting point for any project that needs the basics:
✅ JWT Authentication
✅ Secrets Management (User Secrets / Docker Secrets)
✅ Localizer ready for multiple languages
✅ Complete test structure (unit, integration, and contract)
✅ Docker ready for production

react.title: React
react.text: Solid experience in developing modern applications using React.js, focusing on performance, componentization, and best architecture practices.

reactNative.title: React Native
reactNative.text: Development of cross-platform mobile apps with React Native, ensuring high performance and integration with native features.

apis.title: APIs & Backend
apis.text: Creation of scalable and secure RESTful APIs, integrating systems and ensuring efficient communication between services.

devops.title: Infra & DevOps
devops.text: Experience with automation, continuous integration, and cloud deployment, ensuring scalability and high availability.
